About.developed: This user interface is developed as open source software.
About.patchnotes: Changes in monitoring for this build

EmergencyReserve.INFO_FOR_EMERGENCY_RESERVE_SLIDER: An emergency power reserve of between 5 % and 100 % of the battery capacity can be set by activating it.

Energymonitor.title: Energy monitor
Energymonitor.ERROR_TEMPORARY: Error retrieving the data. Please try again later.

Widgets.autarchyInfo: Self-sufficiency indicates the percentage of the power currently used that is covered by generation and storage discharge.
Widgets.phasesInfo: The sum of the individual phases may differ slightly from the total sum for technical reasons.
Widgets.selfconsumptionInfo: Self-consumption indicates the percentage of the currently generated power that is used by direct consumption and storage charging.
Widgets.twoWayInfoGrid: Negative values correspond to grid feed-in, positive values correspond to grid consumption
Widgets.InfoStorageForCharge: Negative values correspond to storage loading
Widgets.InfoStorageForDischarge: Positive values correspond to memory discharge

Singlethreshold.moreThanMaxPower: Value must not be lower than the maximum power of the controlled device
Singlethreshold.relationError: Threshold value must be greater than the switched load

DelayedSellToGrid.relationError: Loading limit must be greater than the discharge limit

Peakshaving.asymmetricInfo: Entered power values refer to individual phases. The most heavily loaded phase is used for regulation.
Peakshaving.relationError: Discharge limit must be greater than or equal to the loading limit

GridOptimizedCharge.endTimeDescription: Loading is not carried out at maximum power for a few hours, but evenly over a longer period of time.
GridOptimizedCharge.endTimeDetailedDescription: Loading does not take place at maximum capacity for a few hours, but evenly at a maximum of {{ value1 }} to {{ value2 }} clock.
GridOptimizedCharge.expectedSocWithoutSellToGridLimit: Without avoiding the maximum grid feed-in

History.batteryChargeGridLimitDescription: The maximum grid feed-in, from which the battery charge is increased (if possible), is below the maximum permitted grid feed-in in order to prevent premature curtailment of generation.
History.priorityDescription: The minimum load has a higher priority than the maximum load

LOW.functionDescription: Comparatively early loading of the storage tank
LOW.storageDescription: Higher probability that the storage tank will be fully loaded
LOW.pvCurtail: Lower probability of avoiding the curtailment of the PV system

MEDIUM.functionDescription: Comparatively even loading of the storage tank
MEDIUM.storageDescription: High probability that the storage tank will be fully loaded
MEDIUM.pvCurtail: High probability that the curtailment of the PV system will be avoided

HIGH.functionDescription: Comparatively later loading of the storage tank
HIGH.storageDescription: Less likelihood of the memory becoming full
HIGH.pvCurtail: Higher probability of avoiding the curtailment of the PV system

GridOptimizedCharge.settingOnlyVisableForInstaller: This setting is only visible to the installer

State.noLimitPossible: No limitation Possible (limited by controls with higher priority)
State.passedEndTime: End time of limited loading exceeded

EVCS.chargingStationPluggedInEVLocked: Charging station + e-car plugged in + locked
EVCS.clusterConfigError: An error has occurred during the configuration of the Evcs cluster
EVCS.maxEnergyRestriction: Limit maximum energy per charging process

Administration.customCarInfo: If this is the case, your car can only be loaded efficiently above a certain capacity. This button will take this into account in your configuration options and automatic loading.
Administration.renaultZoe: Is this charging station mainly used to charge a Renault Zoe?

NoConnection.description: No connection to the charging station could be established.
NoConnection.help1_1: The IP of the charging station appears when it is switched on again
NoConnection.help1: Check whether the charging station is switched on and accessible via the mains

OptimizedChargeMode.info: In this mode, the load of the car is adapted to the current production and consumption.
OptimizedChargeMode.minInfo: If you want to prevent the car from not charging at all during the night, you can set a minimum charge level.
OptimizedChargeMode.name: Optimized loading

ChargingPriority.info: Depending on the prioritization, the selected component is loaded first

ForceChargeMode.info: In this mode, the charging of the car is forced, i.e. it is always guaranteed that the car will be charged, even if the charging station has to access mains power.
ForceChargeMode.maxChargingDetails: If the car cannot charge the maximum value entered, the power is automatically limited.
ForceChargeMode.name: Forced loading

EVCS.Uncontrollable: This charging station cannot be controlled.

HeatPump.aboveSoc: and from the state of charge of
HeatPump.belowSoc: and under state of charge of
HeatPump.moreThanMaxPower: Value must not be lower than the maximum output of the heat pump
HeatPump.relationError: Switch-on command Surplus value must be greater than switch-on recommendation value

TIME_OF_USE_TARIFF.CHARGE_FROM_GRID_ACTIVATE: Activate charge from the grid (BETA test)
TIME_OF_USE_TARIFF.CHART_WARNING_NOTE: The graphic shows the past three hours as well as the planned future operating mode for the period for which the dynamic network reference prices are available. Please note that the timetable is continuously recalculated and can therefore change during the course of the day.

RETROFITTING.UPDATE_TO_NEW_VERSION: An update to the latest version is required to be able to use the capacity expansion.
RETROFITTING.INFORMATION_FOR_INSTANT_START: The battery is charged or discharged at maximum power in order to reach {{targetSoc}} % state of charge as quickly as possible for an extension. This may involve drawing from or feeding into the grid. This state of charge is maintained for {{targetTimeBuffer}} minutes, after which the storage system returns to the regular operating state or after the capacity has been expanded.
RETROFITTING.INFORMATION_FOR_PlANNED_EXPANSION: The battery is expected to be charged/discharged from {{targetTime}} clock on {{targetDate}} in order to reach {{targetSoc}} % state of charge for the planned extension. This can result in grid consumption or grid feed-in. This state of charge is held for {{targetTimeBuffer}} minutes, after which the storage system returns to the regular operating state or after the capacity has been expanded.
RETROFITTING.INFORMATION_FOR_PlANNED_EXPANSION_INVALI: The battery is expected to be charged/discharged to reach {{targetSoc}} % for the planned extension.
RETROFITTING.TARGET_TIME_SPECIFIED: Capacity expansion will be carried out on {{targetDate}} at {{targetTime}}

PROFILE.ERROR_DOWNLOADING_MODBUS_PROTOCOL: Error when downloading the Modbus protocol

Scheduler.contact: This should not happen. Please contact {{ value }}.

App.NAME: App Center
App.header: The App Manager is currently in an initial test version.
App.updateAvailable: There is a new {{ edgeShortName }} version available! Please update the {{ edgeShortName }} so that all new {{ edgeShortName }} apps are displayed in the App Center.
App.UNUSED_REGISTERED_KEY_AVAILABLE: There is still an app available for installation! Click on 'Redeem license key' to install it.

Key.enterKey: Enter the license key you received when you ordered the app here
Key.useRegisteredKey: Redeem an already registered license key?
Key.alreadyRegisteredDifferentSystem: License key has already been registered on another system! If you continue, the other registration will be removed.
Key.failedLoadingRegisterKey: Already registered keys could not be retrieved
Key.alreadyRegisteredDifferentApp:
Key has already been registered for an app on this system!
If you continue, the other registration will be removed.
Key.KEY_TYPO_MESSAGE_HINT:
Note: When entering the license key, pay attention to possible typos:
  • small L "l" vs. capital i "I"
  • zero "0" vs. capital o "O"
We always recommend copying the license key from the delivery bill and pasting it into the field above instead of typing it in manually.
Key.MASTER_KEY_HINT: Note: The master key is used in the background. No key is displayed. If you have a license key, please use it.

Network.errorReadingConfiguration: Error reading the current network configuration:
Network.mandatoryFields: Please fill in the mandatory fields
Network.validAddressWarning: Under "Add static IP addresses", enter a valid IP address with a netmask, e.g. 10.4.1.6/24

General.connectionLost: Connection interrupted. Try to re-establish the connection.
General.SystemOutage: Due to maintenance work, online monitoring is temporarily only available to a limited extent. Please try again later. You can find more information at

Index.NO_EDGE_AVAILABLE: You have not yet added a {{edgeShortName}}.
Index.VISIBLE_HERE_AFTER_INSTALLATION: After your {{edgeShortName}} has been commissioned by an installer, you will see it here.
Index.NO_EDGE_FOR_USER: Unfortunately, no {{edgeShortName}} has been linked to your account yet.

INSTALLATION.ATTENTION_MESSAGE: Please note that the selection cannot be reversed at a later date.

CONFIGURATION_EXECUTE.START_FUNCTION_TEST: Functional tests started for the installed components
CONFIGURATION_EXECUTE.FINISH_FUNCTION_TEST: Functional tests for the installed components completed

Login.title: Login
Login.preamble: Please enter your password or confirm the previous entry to log in as a guest.

SYSTEM_UPDATE.LATEST_VERISON: The system is up to date with the latest software version
SYSTEM_UPDATE.RESTARTING: {{system}} is restarted (this can take up to {{minutes}} minutes)
SYSTEM_UPDATE.RESTART_WARNING: Communication is interrupted while {{system}} is restarting. No data is recorded or components are controlled during this time. Please ensure that the entire system is in a safe state.
SYSTEM_UPDATE.CONFIRMATION_INFO: Would you like to update your {{edgeShortName}}?
SYSTEM_UPDATE.WARNING: As part of the system update, {{system}} is restarted and communication is interrupted. No data is recorded or components are controlled during this time. Please ensure that the entire system is in a safe state.
SYSTEM_UPDATE.SUB_HEADER: Would you like to perform a system update?

CHANNELS.SAVE_DESCRIPTION: Saving the new configuration overwrites the existing one for this {{edgeShortName}} and is applied when the page is reloaded.
